text.value:
UPDATE YESB_PROJ_HDR 
SET 
    TIMESTAMP = TIMESTAMP,
    PROJ_DESC1 = PROJ_DESC1,
    PROJ_DESC2 = PROJ_DESC2,
    SITE_ADRRS = SITE_ADRRS,
    PROJ_COORD = PROJ_COORD,
    SITE_CONT_NAME1 = SITE_CONT_NAME1,
    SITE_CONT_TEL1 = SITE_CONT_TEL1,
    SITE_CONT_NAME2 = SITE_CONT_NAME2,
    SITE_CONT_TEL2 = SITE_CONT_TEL2,
    GEO_FENCE_ID = GEO_FENCE_ID,
    CONTRY_KEY = CONTRY_KEY,
    CITY = CITY,
    POST_CODE = POST_CODE,
    REGION = REGION,
    SORT_FIELD = SORT_FIELD,
    TELE_NO = TELE_NO,
    FAX_NO = FAX_NO,
    STATUS = STATUS,
    INTER_ID = INTER_ID,
    ERROR_CD = ERROR_CD,
    PROC_TS = PROC_TS,
    REC_TYPE = REC_TYPE,
    USERID = USERID,
    UDATE = UDATE,
    UTIME = UTIME
WHERE EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM YMSDT_PROJ_HDR 
    WHERE MANDT = @{pipeline().parameters.MANDT}
      AND PROJ_ID = @{pipeline().parameters.PROJ_ID}
);
